dict.acceptation: 宽的；普遍的；广阔的；张大的，开得很大的；

sent.orig: The wide receiver was wide open when the quarterback threw him the ball.
sent.trans: 当四分卫传给外接球员时，他身旁什麽人也没有。

sent.orig: Chokepoints can come in many forms, sometimes just one tile wide, sometimes 4 or 5 wide.
sent.trans: 要点有好几种形式，可能只有一格宽，或者4-6格宽。

sent.orig: To create a one metre wide path you need to excavate a one metre wide trench.
sent.trans: 要建一条一米宽的小路，你需要开凿一条一米宽的深沟。

sent.orig: Adjustable concentric tray micrometer adjust wide Loading unloading structure can adjust ACF tacking wide correctly.
sent.trans: 所有收放料结构均采用可调式同心料盘及料宽千分尺调节机构来精准调节ACF贴附宽度。

sent.orig: An approximately three-foot-wide (meter-wide) Darwin's bark spider web hangs above a river in Madagascar.
sent.trans: 这张达尔文吠蛛织成的蛛网大约三尺宽（约一米宽），横跨在马达加斯加岛的一条河上。
